PSCT.Base: Shuffle into the Deck, 5 of your "World Legacy" cards with different names that are banished, in your hand or GY, and/or face-up on your field, except "World Legacy Trap Globe", then draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "World Legacy Trap Globe" per turn.
